titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income the gain on certain sales of lands subject to ground leases.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/20/1988--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income any gain derived from the sale, on or before December 31, 1995, to the lessee of land subject to a ground lease and on which the only buildings are residential.
